Class Picture

java.lang.Object
  Picture

public class Picture
extends java.lang.Object

A class that represents a picture made up of a rectangle of Pixels

Constructor Summary
Picture(java.awt.Color color, int height, int width)
          Creates a solid-color Picture of a given color, width, and height

          Creates a Picture from an image file in the "images" directory

Picture

public Picture(Pixel[][] pixels)
Creates a Picture based off of an existing Pixel 2D array

Parameters:
pixels - A rectangular 2D array of Pixels. Must be at least 1x1

picture - The name of the file to load

save

public void save()
Save the image on disk as a JPEG Call programmatically on a Picture object, it will prompt you to choose a save location In the save dialogue window, specify the file AND extension (e.g. "lilies.jpg") Extension must be .jpg as ImageIO is expecting to write a jpeg
